subtitle: You could also use pumpkin in this recipe.

method.text: Heat the butter in a frying pan. Saute the bacon and salad onions for 2 min.
Put all ingredients, except the cheese, in a large pan. Bring to the boil.
Simmer for 90 min, skimming the surface every 15 min.
Place all ingredients, except the cheese, in a food processor. Process until smooth.
Return to a clean pan. Stir in the cheese. Season to taste.

title: Butternut squash soup
